TopicTitle: What are your Favourite Visual Mods?

Articles.Content:
What are your favourite visual mods/ visual mod combinations? 

My personal favourite is Sci-Fi Visual Enhancements with, or without scatterer as lately scatterer has been misbehaving (Duna is transparent) on my system. Sci-Fi's default atmospheres look amazing without scatterer anyway, and it runs very well. It's nice to have a mod that doesn't feel like its restricted to scatterer only use.

So, what about you?

Edited September 15, 2019 by RocketSimplicity
